summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Too Fast To Click game. All core gameplay features, UI components, and backend APIs are working correctly. Game provides smooth mobile-first experience with vibrant 3D arcade styling.
passed_tests: Landing screen renders with correct title 'TOO FAST TO CLICK'
All 3 mode cards present and clickable (Classic, Rule Switch, Chaos)
FAQ section with 5 questions and working accordion functionality
Game screen loads with complete HUD (score, lives, time, speed indicator)
Game objects spawn correctly with emoji content in styled cards
Score system updates correctly on correct/incorrect clicks
Lives system works with heart indicators (3 lives, decrease on wrong clicks)
Game Over screen displays with all stats (score, survival time, best streak, max speed, tier badge)
Navigation buttons work (Play Again, Try other mode, Home)
Share Score clipboard functionality working
Pause overlay with Resume button working
Sound toggle button functional
All 3 game modes start successfully (Classic, Rule Switch, Chaos)
Rule display shows current game rule correctly
Speed indicator bar fills and changes color appropriately
Streak indicator appears after 3+ consecutive correct clicks
Backend API: POST /api/scores working correctly
Backend API: GET /api/scores/leaderboard returns proper data
Backend API: GET /api/scores/stats returns global statistics
CORS configuration working properly
